name: MEALS ON WHEELS AMERICA
sampleDescriptions: Issues relating to the reauthorization of the Older Americans Act; legislation related to senior nutrition programs.
Federal nutrition programs authorized through the Farm Bill.
Matters relating to FY 2018 Appropriations and Budget funding and processes; funding for senior nutrition programs under the Older Americans Act and related nutrition and public health programs.
Charitable tax deductions; mileage reimbursement for volunteer service; donations of food inventory.
Matters relating to healthcare expenditures, Medicaid and Medicare, chronic conditions, nutrition and public health.
